name: antigift
short_description:
antigift could be used for encryption files & folders on USB-flash or HDD partition(with ccrypt in background). Works out of box on Linux, Windows, FreeBSD, MacOS X and other on OSes. Do not required installation. Included wipe tool for wiping free space and misskey for recovering partially forgotten key.

See documentation at http://sourceforge.net/p/antigift/wiki/Home/

antigift простой и кросс-платформенный инструмент для шифрования файлов и папок(с ccrypt в качестве основы)

Подробности см. на страничке с русской документацией  http://sourceforge.net/p/antigift/wiki/rus/
summary: antigift is simple cross-platform, files & folders encryption tool

screenshots.caption: Wipe out free space on Windows
